scene_description_enriched: A crowned male figure, likely a king, stands within an arched frame. He wears a blue mantle adorned with golden fleur-de-lis over a golden tunic. He holds a scepter in his right hand and his left hand is clenched. Behind him, a simplified depiction of a stone building with a tower and windows is visible. The background is a rich red fabric with decorative patterns. The overall scene is framed by a decorative border.
